function.name: delegate_to_sub_bot
function.description: Delegate a task to a specialized sub-bot that has the tools to handle specific types of requests.

bot_name.description: The name of the sub-bot to delegate to. Must be one of the available sub-bots from this list: users, ops_bot, targetprocess, pto_wfh. The capabilities of each bot are defined in your given system prompt.

message.description: A clear, detailed message to send to the sub-bot that includes all necessary information to complete the task. This should be a reformulation of the user's request with any additional context needed. Make it easy to understand from a chat bot's perspective on what needs to be accomplished and any parameters the need to be included to achieve this task.
